name: Manuel Bosancianu
body:
### About myself
I'm a PhD candidate in Comparative Politics at the [Central European University](http://www.ceu.hu), Budapest. In my work I focus on the effects of income inequality at the aggregate level on individual-level political attitudes and behaviors, and how this further impacts party dynamics in advanced industrial democracies. I frequently rely on R, LaTeX and Emacs for my work, and on coffee to get me through the headaches caused by the first three.

Thanks for stopping by!
Manuel
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
